name: Billy Stickman
description:
Billy Stickman is a 2D platform adventure game. Use your friend Fredd to go trough the levels. Your goal is to defeat the AI which is a very big robot.

The game has 8 wonderfull tracks I made using FL Studio. I tried to make all the art really quick. But in the end it became a nice funny style.

A good tip is to LOOK AT THE SIGNS they give you good information. Read them well.
